official_title: A bill to limit the use of foreign icebreakers in United States waters.

summary.text: Prohibits a foreign icebreaker from engaging in icebreaking in U.S. waters, except: (1) to aid a vessel in distress; and (2) where the Commissioner of Customs determines that a suitable domestic vessel is unavailable.

titles.title: A bill to limit the use of foreign icebreakers in United States waters.
